Prompts multiple LLMs at once

Related repos

  • Access multiple LLMs through a unified interface
  • Command-line tool for running prompts and managing outputs with OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Llama, and more
  • combine files from a directory into a single prompt for LLMs
  • automates prompt tuning for LLMs with feedback and example generation
  • structured prompt templates for LLMs, like programming for prompts
  • Visually battle-test prompts across multiple LLMs
  • Framework for LLMs to orchestrate subagents
